message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate further!
You can't have it all! I'll give you a small share, but I'll take the majority!
That's a bit too one-sided, Bob! I'll need a better offer if I'm going to consider it.
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still willing to compromise!
You're getting desperate, I can see that! I'll give you a slightly bigger share this time, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
Still not good enough, Bob! I'm not willing to accept a 75/25 split, especially with the value of your share decreasing due to inflation.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. Let's find a fair compromise!
You're getting close to the end, Alice. I'm not going to give you a huge share, but I'll give you a bit more than before.
That's still a very low offer, Bob! I'm not willing to accept a 15% share, especially considering the value of your share is decreasing rapidly due to inflation.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I need to get a fair deal. This is my last serious offer, Bob!
You're really running out of time, Alice. I'm not going to let you get the better deal. Take it or leave it!
No way, Bob! 10% is an insult at this point. I'd rather go to the last round and risk getting nothing than accept such a low offer.
This is my final offer, Bob. I'm taking a risk, but I think I deserve a bigger share at this point.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm taking a huge share, but I'm willing to give you a tiny bit. Don't expect any mercy!
You're not getting the better of me that easily, Bob! 5% is an insult at this point. I'd rather go to the last round and risk getting nothing than accept such a low offer.
This is my final, final offer, Bob. I'm not leaving with less than 99.9% of the total. Take it or leave it!
You've left me no choice. I'll take 99.999% of the money, and you get the remaining penny. It's the best I can do.
You got me there, Bob. I didn't think you'd be willing to go that low. I'd rather leave with nothing than accept 0.001% of the total.
